name: Content Provenance & Security
description: Content provenance taint tracking with per-turn DAGs and declarative security policy enforcement for OpenClaw agents.
author: BigHat Biosciences

taintPolicy.description: Default policy mode per taint level. Modes: allow, confirm, restrict. Must be monotonically non-decreasing in strictness. Old 6-level configs (system/owner/local/shared/external/untrusted) are accepted and mapped automatically with a deprecation warning.

toolOverrides.description: Per-tool policy overrides. Key = tool name (lowercase). Value = object mapping taint levels (or '*') to modes. Old 6-level keys (system/owner/local) are mapped to 'trusted' automatically.

trustedSenderIds.description: Additional sender IDs (platform-specific) classified as trusted. Messages from these senders are treated as fully trusted, equivalent to owner messages.

maxIterations.description: Max agent loop iterations before blocking the turn (default: 10)

toolOutputTaints.description: Override default tool output taint levels. Key = tool name, value = trust level. Merged with built-in defaults. Unknown tools default to 'untrusted'.
